Title: Exit Strategy
Plot: Gob goes to Iraq to perform his Christian magic act on the USO tour and ends up incarcerated. Michael learns George, Sr. sent Gob to Iraq to burn down the model home he built there, so Michael and Buster fly to Iraq to spring their brother from prison.
GuestStars: John Michael Higgins, James O. Evans, Gary Cole, Jon Curry, Robert Michael Morris, Kathy Kolla, Cooper Thornton, Michael A. Shepperd, Richard Belzer, Mousa Kraish, Bashar Rahal, Ross Gibby, Hector Atreyu Ruiz, Tyl
